name: Sol Invictus (Greet)
description:
Amid the darkest of times, a healer uses his last resources trying to save his people.

Use your healing abilities and save as many people as you can from the deadly plague. Gain experience when you heal, and use it to unlock and improve your capacities.

 Bindings

Move with WASD  Cast an ability with 2, 3 or 4  Unlock or upgrade an ability with Shift+1, Shift+2, Shift+3 & Shift+4  

Aim your spell using mouse
